column2:
To cite R in publications use:

  R Core Team (2025). _R: A Language and
  Environment for Statistical
  Computing_. R Foundation for
  Statistical Computing, Vienna,
  Austria. <https://www.R-project.org/>.

A BibTeX entry for LaTeX users is

  @Manual{,
    title = {R: A Language and Environment for Statistical Computing},
    author = {{R Core Team}},
    organization = {R Foundation for Statistical Computing},
    address = {Vienna, Austria},
    year = {2025},
    url = {https://www.R-project.org/},
  }

We have invested a lot of time and
effort in creating R, please cite it
when using it for data analysis. See
also ‘citation("pkgname")’ for citing R
packages.
